CustomField.description: Determines how many months into the future Recurring Job Shifts are scheduled. Scheduling more than 4 months may cause a Salesforce CPU time limit exceeded error, which would prevent the Job Scheduler from completing.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines how many months into the future Recurring Job Shifts are scheduled. Scheduling more than 4 months may cause a Salesforce CPU time limit exceeded error, which would prevent the Job Scheduler from completing.
CustomField.label: Recurring Job Future Months
